jobTitle: CDL A Truck Driver Company Drivers Newark
jobDescription: Company Drivers, Average Annual $ 85,000, $4000 Sign ON Bonus, Typical Monthly Schedule: 3 Weeks Solo Home Daily, 1 Week Team  Requisition ID: 854  Our drivers get steady work, make good money and get predictable home time. You'll drive clean, late-model equipment and our office staff will give you the respect and support you deserve. If this is what you're looking for, we want you.For more information contact Dave at 833.243.6555Truck Driver Pay & Benefits  Full-time CDL truck drivers are eligible for:  ++++++++++++++++++++Dedicated Local / Regional  $4000 Sign On Bonus  3 weeks a month Local delivery, Solo, Home Daily, pull doubles  1 week a month run cross-country, drop-n-hook team routes, 53' dry vans  Driver-Friendly freight; mostly drop & hook or stores have receiving teams to assist  All routes dispatch and return to Newark, CA terminal  Comprehensive Benefits Options after 30 days: Major Medical, Dental, Vision, Life Insurance, more  401K option after 90 Days  7 Paid Holidays Annually  Paid Vacations  Weekly Pay by Direct Deposit  Eligible for Quarterly Fuel Bonus  Paid Orientation / Training  Late Model Equipment Spec'd for Driver Comfort  24/7/365 Operations Support Truck Driver Qualifications Include: Class A Commercial Driver's License (CDL-A)  9 Months T/T experience in the last 3 yrs, or 2 years of experience with in the past 5 years  Doubles endorsement  22+ yrs. of age  EEO/AA/m/f/Vets/Disabled
